name: Mall Car Parking Simulator
description:
Be hold the Mall Car Parking Simulator!
Are you an expert car driver & can you park your car exactly in multi-storey car parking plaza?
Or the supermarket parking lot! Real time parking challenge is the extreme racing car parking madness free game. Although drive safe & don’t call the visiting angels to come take you away. Mall Car Parking Simulator has it all.
People can’t wait to jump out of their luxury limos, sports cars, local bus, suv, wagon cars and public transport bus to get into the impossible rush of the shopping mall.
This is where you make your hero like entry & become the crazy driver of valet car parking.Unleash your inner craze driver & join the real car parking frenzy pro!

Parking lots are tricky places for buses, trucks, but it’s not so hardship to park cars, limousines & other sports car. Multi storey parking mania is like monster trucks 3d parking simulation games.
The realistic parking adventure begins the moment the drivers hand you the keys and you become the upstate car owner for a drive!

This isn’t a drive through supermarket which is why it explains your job as valet car parker & driver.
Unleash the crazy driver & start the Mall Car Parking Simulator parking mania.
The luxury cars feels so smooth against your hands & you can’t get enough.
So take the sports car for a spin through the Mall Car Parking Simulator plaza and have your way with it. Awesomesauce!

Drift in your Mall Car Parking simulator & enjoy being a valet parking simulation pro. Real drifting skills come with practice.
Don’t drive like you’re in a caution game! Drive as if a crazy driver has possessed you and park with finesse.
Ready for the gaming world yet? Plung in to the luxury valet car parking simulator in multi level supermarket plaza & shopping mall!

Mall Car Parking Simulator features
• Precision parking valet challenges
• Realistic drifting, racing car multilevel parker skills
• Better than monster trucks 3d parking
• Multi storey parking lot for crazy drivers & truckers
• Navigate through Impossible rush in shopping mall & supermarket

Download this awesome extreme upstate real Mall Car Parking Simulator & master all valet challenges.
